description:
Seven Knights - Time Wanderer -  Guardian Costume Set
 Honorable costumes of the guardians that saved the world in the past - a must-have for a hero!
 
 <Set Contents>
 - Vanessa's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Orly's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Karl Heron's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Aquila's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Ace's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Kagura's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Teo's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Rudy's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Elysia's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Kris's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Karma's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 - Rin's Costume "Guild Guardian"
 12 Total
 
 <Warning>
 - You can only purchase the costume set once.
 - You can equip in-game after purchasing.
 - Please claim from "May" in the Room of Sand.
 - Hero portraits don't change.
 - Costumes only change hero appearance - they don't increase stats.
name: Guardian Costume Set (12 Total)
